title: Polo Ralph Lauren 's workforce worldwide 2009 to 2019
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Number of employees, with a total of 11 data points. The chart has 6 significant trends.
The longest trend is extremely positive which exists from 2012 to 2009.
Correspondingly, the next significant trend is moderately positive which exists from 2019 to 2017.
Also, the next significant trend is moderately positive which exists from 2016 to 2014.
Likewise, the next significant trend is slightly negative which exists from 2017 to 2016.
On the other hand, the next significant trend is moderately neutral which exists from 2014 to 2013.
On the other hand, the next significant trend is slightly negative which exists from 2013 to 2012.
gold: This statistic shows the number of employees of Polo Ralph Lauren worldwide from 2009 to 2019 . The New York-based fashion company Polo Ralph Lauren had approximately 24,300 employees worldwide as of 2019.Ralph Lauren CorporationThe company began in 1967 and is an internationally renowned brand . The company got its start by selling creatively designed neckties .
